Projects

Web Based

Jafnee.com

My personal website.

This is a static website consisting of multiple HTML files. The website is styled using Sass and uses PureCSS for it's responsive modules. I make use of Grunt to automate compiling of Sass, minifying images and minifying CSS. The website is deployed through the use of GitHub's webhooks, every time a new commit is pushed to the master branch, the VPS will pull the changes and updates the website's files.

The website is hosted on a self managed virtual private server (VPS) running Debian GNU/Linux and Apache as the web server.

Technologies used: HTML, Sass, JavaScript, Grunt, Apache

Source
Demo

Generic Space Shooter

A web-based top-down scrolling shoot-em-up game set in space.
The game features level based gameplay with increasing difficulty, various enemies each with different behaviours and multiple power-ups for the player to collect.

*Game has not been tested on mobile.

Technologies used: HTML5 canvas, JavaScript

Source
Demo

Solar System

A 3D WebGL solar system.
JavaScript 3D libraries such as three.js are not used to simplify drawing and manipulating the objects. Instead glMatrix, a JavaScript matrix and vector library was used to perform matrix calculations on a 3D object's vertices in order to manipulate it.

Different forms of lighting such as ambient, diffuse and specular were used. Specular maps were also applied to some planets

Technologies used: WebGL, HTML5 canvas, JavaScript

Source
